OptionActiveDescription.message: Disabling this turns off all filtering functionality

OptionPlaceholdersDescription.message: Show placeholders in place of filtered content (disable to hide filtered content completely)

OptionPageActionPopupMenuDescription.message: Enable the popup menu on the icon in the address bar (disable this to open the management screen directly)

OptionManagementPanelTypeDescription.message: Specifies where/how the main mangement panel is displayed
